title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Palisades Park, New Jersey
content:
Photo submitted by George Marriog-Tagle, “Went for a solo ride from NYC to Nyack, NY, stopping at Palisades Park on the way home to enjoy the view. If you squint you can barely see the city in the background. On my do-it-all favorite bike, a No.22 Drifter.” We always love seeing photos from where you are […]

The post Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Palisades Park, New Jersey appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Kristi Benedict
